name: Pug Server
content: npm package, based on pugjs and express that allows you to serve a functional prototype website.

name: Let Me Google That For You Queries
content: After having discovered that LMGTF short urls are sequentials, we polled the users queries for further analysis.

name: Illegal Auth Attempts
content: Having several public facing devices, I was curious to see if they were attempts to access them.
I made a script that scrap from auth.log or secure files the IPs that tried to log in and the users that were used to do so.

name: What You Doin' CLI Task Manager
content: This is a simple command-line task manager, made in C and depending on Sqlite3.

name: Right-to-left Override Attack POC
content: Using the Right-to-left Override unicode character, you can switch the text orientation mid-sentence. This can be used to fool a user and make them think they're opening a harmless file.
This proof of concept use the unicode character in a filename: "legit-img_sjvlgpj.sh", that will appear as "legit-img_sjvlhs.jpg".

name: Social Call Browser Extension
content: Replace social media posts (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram) with random string from an array.
This extension purpose is to highlight the deep social distress that dictate our behavior on social media.

name: Comment into the Void React Component
content: Create a comment section that is not plugged into any backend or database. A user will only see their own comments.
This component is a statement about online hate, trolls, and the real value of comment sections.

name: Resume Generator
content: Electron app to customize a resume and export it in PDF.

name: Cover Letter Generator
content: Electron app to customize a cover letter and export it in PDF.

name: Naming Suggestions Script
content: Simple Python script to generate name suggestions based on 2 words and thesaurus.

name: CLI News Stream
content: Ruby project that will stream in the CLI the RSS feeds you referenced.

name: Campaign against Sexual Harassment At Work Page
content: Single page website made for the Defenseur des droits' communication campaign of February '18.

name: Petite histoire des grands droits
content: Landing page for 2018 Défenseur des droits communication campaign dedicated to children's rights.

name: CC1710
content: Landing page for 2017 Défenseur des droits communication campaign.

name: CC1610
content: Landing page for 2016 Défenseur des droits communication campaign.

name: Apache Magazine
content: A French online lifestyle and opinions magazine run only by volunteers.
